system.description: A diagnostic system is in - terfaced with the user's biological processes, al- lowing a realtime analysis of their current health and any significant injuries. Aside from imme- diately alerting the user when they are poisoned, diseased, or injured, it grants any healing or med- ical support skill check a +2 bonus thanks to the diagnostic information and increases first aid or drug healing by +2 HP per application.
